title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Mobile-Based Dance Creation Flipped Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design more than three original dance movement sequences using the Creative Problem-Solving (CPS) framework.
Learners can explain dance creation theory elements with over 80% accuracy by analyzing mobile learning materials.
Learners can revise dance works at least twice by incorporating peer feedback during face-to-face collaboration sessions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
